definitions.definition: a long roll of paper or similar material with usually official writing on it:
examples: The ancient Egyptians stored information on scrolls.

definitions.definition: a decoration that looks like a roll of paper:
examples: The tops of the marble pillars were decorated with scrolls.

definitions.definition: to move text or other information on a computer screen in order to see a different part of it:
examples: Scroll to the end of the document.
